overview: Abroad at the time of her death, a grandson returns to revisit the house of his late grandmother, now occupied by another family. A reflection on the love for a home where one grew up and yet made by a grandmother missing another life, in another house, in another country.
tagline: A grandson revisits the memories of his late grandmother's house, confronting the nostalgia that binds him to this childhood place with the History behind it.
title: Coming and Going
